<a id="RDShaderSPIRV"></a>

# RDShaderSPIRV

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

SPIR-V intermediate representation as part of an [RDShaderFile](RDShaderFile.md) (used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md)).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**RDShaderSPIRV** represents an [RDShaderFile](RDShaderFile.md)'s [SPIR-V](https://www.khronos.org/spir/) code for various shader stages, as well as possible compilation error messages. SPIR-V is a low-level intermediate shader representation. This intermediate representation is not used directly by GPUs for rendering, but it can be compiled into binary shaders that GPUs can understand. Unlike compiled shaders, SPIR-V is portable across GPU models and driver versions.

This object is used by [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_compute"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedByteArray](PackedByteArray.md) **bytecode_compute** = `PackedByteArray()` [ðŸ”—](#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_compute)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stage_bytecode**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage), bytecode\: [PackedByteArray](PackedByteArray.md)\ )
- [PackedByteArray](PackedByteArray.md) **get_stage_bytecode**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The SPIR-V bytecode for the compute shader stage.

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedByteArray](PackedByteArray.md) for more details.

<a id="RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_compute"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **compile_error_compute** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_compute)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_stage_compile_error**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage), compile_error\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_stage_compile_error**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

The compilation error message for the compute shader stage (set by the SPIR-V compiler and Redot). If empty, shader compilation was successful.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="RDShaderSPIRV_method_get_stage_bytecode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[PackedByteArray](PackedByteArray.md) **get_stage_bytecode**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#RDShaderSPIRV_method_get_stage_bytecode)

Equivalent to getting one of [bytecode_compute](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_compute), [bytecode_fragment](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_fragment), [bytecode_tesselation_control](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_tesselation_control), [bytecode_tesselation_evaluation](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_tesselation_evaluation), [bytecode_vertex](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_vertex).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDShaderSPIRV_method_get_stage_compile_error"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[String](String.md) **get_stage_compile_error**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#RDShaderSPIRV_method_get_stage_compile_error)

Returns the compilation error message for the given shader `stage`. Equivalent to getting one of [compile_error_compute](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_compute), [compile_error_fragment](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_fragment), [compile_error_tesselation_control](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_tesselation_control), [compile_error_tesselation_evaluation](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_tesselation_evaluation), [compile_error_vertex](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_vertex).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDShaderSPIRV_method_set_stage_bytecode"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_stage_bytecode**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage), bytecode\: [PackedByteArray](PackedByteArray.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#RDShaderSPIRV_method_set_stage_bytecode)

Sets the SPIR-V `bytecode` for the given shader `stage`. Equivalent to setting one of [bytecode_compute](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_compute), [bytecode_fragment](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_fragment), [bytecode_tesselation_control](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_tesselation_control), [bytecode_tesselation_evaluation](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_tesselation_evaluation), [bytecode_vertex](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_bytecode_vertex).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RDShaderSPIRV_method_set_stage_compile_error"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_stage_compile_error**\ (\ stage\: [ShaderStage](RenderingDevice.md#enum_RenderingDevice_ShaderStage), compile_error\: [String](String.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#RDShaderSPIRV_method_set_stage_compile_error)

Sets the compilation error message for the given shader `stage` to `compile_error`. Equivalent to setting one of [compile_error_compute](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_compute), [compile_error_fragment](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_fragment), [compile_error_tesselation_control](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_tesselation_control), [compile_error_tesselation_evaluation](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_tesselation_evaluation), [compile_error_vertex](RDShaderSPIRV.md#RDShaderSPIRV_property_compile_error_vertex).
